item.title: Using Amiibo on the Cemu Wii U Emulator
item.author: axekinn@proton.me (Axekin)
item.description:
Using Amiibo on the Cemu Wii U Emulator

Author: Axekin(axekinn@proton.me)

Learn to use Amiibo files on the Cemu Wii U emulator. Complete guide with .bin configuration and NFC scanning.

Published on 2025-06-04 at Wiki of Axekin, last modified on 2025-06-04

item.title: Playing with Keyboard & Mouse on Cemu Emulator
item.author: axekinn@proton.me (Axekin)
item.description:
Playing with Keyboard & Mouse on Cemu Emulator

Author: Axekin(axekinn@proton.me)

Learn how to play Wii U games on Cemu with keyboard and mouse. Complete guide with Mouse2Joystick and detailed configuration.

Published on 2025-06-04 at Wiki of Axekin, last modified on 2025-06-04

item.title: Complete Guide to Cheats on the Citra Emulator
item.author: axekinn@proton.me (Axekin)
item.description:
Complete Guide to Cheats on the Citra Emulator

Author: Axekin(axekinn@proton.me)

Learn to use cheat codes on the Citra emulator for Nintendo 3DS. Complete guide with practical examples, troubleshooting and best practices.

Published on 2025-06-04 at Wiki of Axekin, last modified on 2025-06-04
